translation.en: [woman] I have the honor today to introduce you to Retired Captain William Miller.
translation.zh:
今天我很荣幸为大家介绍
已退役的威廉米勒上尉

translation.en: He's been everywhere in the world you all wanna go...
translation.zh: 他去过世界上所有你们想去的地方

translation.en: and a bunch of places you don't.
translation.zh: 外加你们不想去的地方

translation.en: I've asked him to come and talk to you all today
translation.zh: 我今天请他来 是让他在你们

translation.en: at this important crossroad in your careers.
translation.zh:
职业生涯很重要的时期
和你们谈一谈

translation.en: I'm gonna step out so this conversation can be frank and to the point.
translation.zh:
我现在就出去 这样你们可以
坦诚和中肯地对话

translation.en: About five years ago, when I was on leave...
translation.zh: 大概五年前 我当时在休假

translation.en: ...I found myself standing in the middle of the cereal aisle at the Publix...
with my arm around some guy's throat.
translation.zh: 我的胳膊 勒着一个人的脖子

translation.en: I was squeezing so hard he pissed himself.
translation.zh: 我勒得非常用力 他尿了裤子

translation.en: My fiancée at the time had to climb on my back
translation.zh: 我当时的未婚妻不得不爬到我背上

translation.en: just so I didn't actually kill the guy.
translation.zh: 拼命阻止我 我才没杀了他

translation.en: Do you know why I was doing this?
translation.zh: 你们知道我为什么会这样做吗？

translation.en: Because he hadn't moved his cart when I asked.
translation.zh: 因为我让他移开他的购物车 他没动

translation.en: I was the best of the best,
able to shut down, control, manipulate...
all basic human instincts towards one goal:
translation.zh: 所有基本人类本能 只为了一个目标…

translation.en: the completion of my mission.
But the effects of committing extreme violence on other human beings
translation.zh: 但是对其他人类使用极端暴力

translation.en: are biological
and physiological.
That's the price of being a warrior.
translation.zh: 这就是成为一名勇士的代价

translation.en: [pilot on radio, in Spanish] Is everything clear in the valley?
Affirmative!
[pilot] Copy that.
Enter, enter, enter!
[pilot] Let's go!
♪ Make his fight on the hill In the early day ♪
[officer 2 over radio] Enter, enter, enter.
[officer 3 over megaphone] Let me inform you
that we have you surrounded.
So, put down your weapons,
come out of the building
with your hands behind your head.
How many did you say were in there?
No more than ten.
You guys hold this position.
We're going to find other cover.
translation.zh: 我们去找一个别的掩体

translation.en: But hold here.
Good.
Rodriguez!
Rodriguez, can you hold your position?
translation.zh: 罗德里格斯 你能不能守住？

translation.en: [captain over radio] Rodriguez!
Fuck no!
We need to get back.
I said, maintain your positions.
translation.zh: 我再说一遍 守住位置

translation.en: -Hold on! -[officer 4] Move him! Move him!
Rodriguez?
Rodriguez?
[captain over radio] Rodriguez!
[officer 4] Diego!
Hold on!
Advance.
[officer 4] Nice shot.
[Diego] I'm so tired of arresting all of you
translation.zh: 抓了你们 然后又看到你们

translation.en: only to simply find you all here again.
Oh, my adviser is here.
Ready, brother?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗 兄弟？

translation.en: America is listening.
Take the money, brother.
You lose nothing.
I already have the money. [sighs]
And... and Lorea?
[Diego] What was it that you said?
Now you're turning on your own boss?
[stammers] I know where he is.
Fucking snitch. Shh!
[Diego] Where's that?
In Mexico? Disneyland?
Where?
No, no.
He's hiding in the jungle, my brother.
translation.zh: 兄弟 他躲在丛林里

translation.en: He went there because he doesn't trust banks or any of those things anymore. [panting]
translation.zh:
他不相信银行或这类的东西
所以跑进了丛林

translation.en: Sir, you could find him.
translation.zh: 先生 你可以找到他

translation.en: You just got yourself killed, fucker.
translation.zh: 混蛋 你是自寻死路

translation.en: Silence!
Lift up, lift up your little face.
translation.zh: 抬头 抬起你的小脸

translation.en: Is this guy telling me the truth?
Does anyone else out here want to try to assault a police officer?
translation.zh: 这里还有人想攻击警察吗？

translation.en: Or tell fairy tales about Mr. Lorea?
translation.zh: 或者编个有关洛雷亚的假话？

translation.en: Take them to the trucks.
-[officers shouting] -I'll go after her.
Get up there with the bikes, now!
translation.zh: 快骑摩托车上去 快！

translation.en: Move! Move!
[Diego over radio] Santiago? Santiago?
translation.zh: 桑提亚哥？ 桑提亚哥？

translation.en: [Diego] Santiago, where are you?
translation.zh: 桑提亚哥 你在哪里？

translation.en: Yes, Diego?
I don't know where I am.
But she escaped. I lost her.
translation.zh: 但是她跑掉了 我跟丢了

translation.en: -[speaking Spanish] -[driver speaking Spanish]
-[in English] What were you doing there? -[woman] Warning my brother.
translation.zh: 你在那里干什么？ 警告我弟弟

translation.en: Jesus.
[woman] You said it was going down at noon,
translation.zh: 你说十二点 才他妈的十点半

translation.en: -and it's ten fucking thirty. -It wasn't my bust.
translation.zh: 你说十二点 才他妈的十点半 是 但是我又不是总指挥 从来都不是

translation.en: It was never my bust. [in Spanish] He changed it.
translation.zh: 是 但是我又不是总指挥 从来都不是 他改了

translation.en: -They took him? -I don't know.
They took my brother, and you have to get him out.
translation.zh: 他们把他抓了 你要把他弄出来

translation.en: -Get him out? -Yes.
You're lucky he's still alive.
But he won't be alive for very long.
[Santiago] You never should've let your idiot brother get involved with this shit.
translation.zh:
你根本就不应该让你的愚蠢弟弟
搅进去这事

translation.en: [in English] What if I told you I know?
translation.zh: 如果我告诉你我知道呢？

translation.en: I know where Lorea is.
I know where the money is.
How long have you known?
Three months.
And why wouldn't you tell me that?
Because I'm just your informant, right?
translation.zh: 因为我只是你的线人 对吗？

translation.en: That's all I am?
If you've got something to tell me, right now is the time to do it.
translation.zh: 如果你有什么想说的 现在就说出来

translation.en: [informant] I...
was given a promotion.
I deliver vans full of money...
translation.zh: 我负责运送满车厢的钱

translation.en: to Lorea's house in the jungle.
translation.zh: 去洛雷亚在丛林里面的房子

translation.en: That's where he keeps the money.
[in Spanish] His house is a safe.
[in English] And just so you know,
Lorea pays Diego and all of those men that hired you way too much money.
translation.zh:
迭戈和所有雇佣你的人
都被洛雷亚收买了

translation.en: They've just been watching you chase your tail.
translation.zh: 他们一直看着你瞎忙活

translation.en: But now, maybe, you can actually do something.
translation.zh: 但是也许现在你可以真正做点事情

translation.en: Your government has put a lot of time, money, and training into all of you,
translation.zh: 你们的政府投入了很多时间 还有资金 来训练你们

translation.en: and it does not want to lose that investment.
translation.zh: 它绝不想浪费这个投资

translation.en: Over the next few weeks,
you will be bombarded with offers to take your skill set and use them
translation.zh: 会有大把的私人公司找你们

translation.en: in the private sector.
I was suckered into the same thing.
translation.zh: 我也被他们骗过做这种事

translation.en: That's what I'm here to say,
translation.zh: 但是我想和你们说的是

translation.en: that I have never had a feeling as pure or proud
translation.zh: 我感到最纯粹、最自豪的时刻

translation.en: as completing a mission with our flag on my shoulder.
translation.zh: 是肩上扛着国旗完成任务的时候

translation.en: Stay where you belong.
Thank you.
-[door opens] -[William] Good luck.
How many times have you given that speech?
translation.zh: 这个演讲你讲过多少次了？

translation.en: It'll be 173.
[Santiago laughs] Still keeping count of everything in your life?
translation.zh: 还在计算生活里的每件事吗？

translation.en: Of course.
-[Santiago] It's still a good speech. -Thank you.
How you been?
I'm okay. You?
Did you get my text?
Yeah.
[Santiago] So? What's your take?
Who else do you have?
I came to you first.
If you can get Redfly,
I'll do it.
Really?
Yeah.
[Santiago] Do you think he's up for it?
I just feel like we owe him. Besides...
translation.zh: 我只是觉得我们还欠他的 另外…

translation.en: it's always a little harder than you think it's gonna be, right?
translation.zh: 事情总是比想象的要难一点 对吗？

translation.en: Get the captain, I'm in.
translation.zh: 把队长找来 我就干

translation.en: So... this is three bedroom... and one and a half baths.
translation.zh: 这栋房子有三个卧室 一个半浴室

translation.en: Nice view out the back window here.
translation.zh: 后边窗外的景色挺不错

translation.en: Gets good light.
Kitchen's right this way.
They're asking $120,000.
-I think there's some flexibility there. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-应该还会有点议价的空间
-嗯

translation.en: I don't think this is the one for us. Thank you, though.
translation.zh:
我觉得这个不适合我们
但还是谢谢你

translation.en: All right, thank you.
[Santiago] Hey, I'm lookin' for a condo.
I hear you're the guy to talk to.
translation.zh: 我听说买公寓可以找你

translation.en: -Sorry to track you down like this. -Hey, man.
translation.zh:
-不好意思跑到这里来找你
-嗨 哥们

translation.en: I called your office.
-[Redfly] It's good to see you. -[Santiago] Good to see you.
translation.zh:
-看到你我很高兴
-嗯 我也是

translation.en: -You look great. -Ah, yeah, right.
-No, you do. -It's been a while, huh?
Well, we didn't hear from you for a couple of years.
translation.zh: 我们有两年没有你的消息

translation.en: We thought you might have gone full native in the jungle.
translation.zh: 还以为你跑去丛林里面做土著人去了

translation.en: [Santiago] Yeah, I know.
Sorry.
-So, how are you? -[Redfly sighs]
Uh... I'm okay.
[Santiago] Yeah, I heard about you and Molly.
translation.zh:
-嗯 我听说你和茉莉的事了
-嗯

translation.en: Yeah. It happens.
So, I got a job for you.
translation.zh: 所以 我有个工作给你

translation.en: Guaranteed 17 grand for a week of consulting.
translation.zh: 做一周顾问 保证一万七的收入

translation.en: No action unless you want it. It's just a recce.
translation.zh: 只是侦查 不需要战斗 除非你想要

translation.en: I'm retired.
I know. [chuckles]
What is it?
We're gonna get Gabriel Martin Lorea.
translation.zh: 我们想拿下加布里马丁洛雷亚

translation.en: [Redfly] Haven't you been trying to do that for years?
translation.zh: 你们不是找他很多年了吗？

translation.en: Yes. I could never find him, and I finally did.
translation.zh: 是的 我一直没能找到他 现在终于找到了

translation.en: I can't do it, man.
There's more of this shit around now than ever.
translation.zh: 现在我这里忙的不可开交

translation.en: Anthony was down here trying to get me to go to Africa for a month,
translation.zh:
那天安东尼还来找我
想让我去非洲一个月

translation.en: -but I-- I can't-- I can't do it. -[Santiago] I need you on this one.
translation.zh:
那天安东尼还来找我
想让我去非洲一个月 但是我… 我没法去 我需要你

translation.en: -It's less than a week of work. -I would love to.
God knows I could use the money, but I'm supporting two households right now.
translation.zh: 我绝对需要钱  我在养两个家庭

translation.en: There's potential for significant upside on this.
translation.zh: 这个工作潜在的利润丰厚

translation.en: Will you just take a look at my work on it?
translation.zh: 哪怕你就看看我的准备工作？

translation.en: -Are you going to Benny's fight? -[Santiago] Yeah.
I gotta pick up Tess. I'm late. Molly's gonna kill me.
translation.zh:
我要去接泰丝 我已经晚了
茉莉会杀了我

translation.en: -Just ride with me, okay? -[Santiago] All right.
[Santiago] Molly's still letting you over here, even after the split?
translation.zh: 所以分开了 茉莉还允许你来这里？

translation.en: Only in the garage.
[Santiago] I'm sorry.
[sighs] Tess!
-Still drink? -[Santiago] Oh, yeah.
Want a beer?
[Tom] Ah, shit.
[sighs] You sleeping with this woman?
The accountant, the bean counter who gave you all the information.
translation.zh: 会计 记账的那个 给你信息的那个

translation.en: I'm guessing she's hot.
-[can opens] -What's that supposed to mean?
Oh, well, I just noticed, over the years,
translation.zh: 我就是注意到这些年来 你的线人

translation.en: your informants tend to be very attractive women.
translation.zh: 我就是注意到这些年来 你的线人 通常都是非常有吸引力的女性

translation.en: No, I'm not.
[clicks tongue, sighs] Why not?
[Santiago] It's a fucked-up enough situation as it is.
[Tom] Hey, babe.
[Santiago] Hey, Tess!
[sighs] Santiago.
Wow, so grown up, man.
-[Tom] Oh, I don't know about that. -[Santiago chuckles]
I made 17 grand my first year in the service, man.
translation.zh: 我服役第一年才挣一万七

translation.en: If you told me then I'd be passing that up for a week's work...
translation.zh:
如果那时候你告诉我
我会拒绝一周挣一万七的工作…

translation.en: Don't worry about her, she's 15. She's not listening to a word we say.
translation.zh:
不用担心 她十五岁
我们说的话 她一个字都听不进去

translation.en: [Santiago] Seventeen grand is just for the recce.
translation.zh: 一万七只是侦查的费用

translation.en: But if we decide to move forward, this could be a whole lot more than that.
translation.zh:
如果我们决定进一步行动
很可能会挣得更多

translation.en: I've cut a deal with the agency down there.
translation.zh: 我和那边的代理谈好了

translation.en: We keep 25% of anything we seize.
translation.zh:
我们查获的所有财物
可留下四分之一

translation.en: I've got estimates he's got over $75 million in cash with him.
translation.zh:
我估计
他有超过七千五百万美元的现金

translation.en: -[Tom] Holy shit. -Yeah.
Let's say the money is there. How do we get paid?
translation.zh: 假设这笔钱真的在那里 我们怎么把钱拿回来？

translation.en: 'Cause this shit is serious, and it takes real planning.
translation.zh: 这活儿很大 需要真正的计划

translation.en: And you know that. [Santiago] I've got a lawyer in St. John's
translation.zh:
-你应该知道的
-我在圣约翰找了个律师

translation.en: who set up an offshore shell security operation
translation.zh: 他帮我设立了一个海外空壳保安公司

translation.en: that's ready to pay out a salary and bonuses for the rest of our lives.
translation.zh: 可以给我们付一辈子的薪水奖金

translation.en: It'll just come in like any other paycheck.
translation.zh: 就像其他人发工资一样

translation.en: Will you take a look at my work on it?
translation.zh: 你能不能看一下我的计划？

translation.en: No, I don't want to see that because then I can't unsee it.
translation.zh: 我不想看 因为看了我就会不停的想

translation.en: This operation is... illegal, right?
translation.zh: 整个行动是非法的 对吧？

translation.en: This is not illegal.
My company's under contract to an agency of a foreign government.
translation.zh: 我的公司和外国政府的代理签了合约

translation.en: And besides, even if it was illegal, most of the live fire you've done's been
translation.zh: 再说就算是非法的 你过去的行动

translation.en: against the Geneva Convention, technically, so...
translation.zh:
从严格意义上讲
都是违反日内瓦公约的

translation.en: [Tom] Come on, you're a better salesman than that. This is a very different thing.
translation.zh:
就这样？你应该有更好的说词
这完全是两码事

translation.en: I'll be right back.
[Tess] So you're trying to get him to go back to work?
translation.zh: 所以你想让他回去工作？

translation.en: Maybe. Why?
No reason.
You think your mom would still let him go?
translation.zh: 你觉得你妈还会让他去吗？

translation.en: [Tess] My mom? [chuckles] Of course.
-She's not the problem. [sighs] -[door chimes jingle]
[Tess] He hasn't worked since they forced him to retire.
translation.zh: 在他们强迫他退役后 他就没工作过

translation.en: Your dad's a good man.
You shouldn't be too hard on him.
So, I guess you'll just keep selling condos,
translation.zh: 所以你继续卖公寓 我继续干我的

translation.en: and I'll run and gun until my knees finally blow out.
translation.zh: 直到有一天我的膝盖跑不动了

translation.en: Or you could do this without me.
translation.zh: 或者你可以干一票 不需要我

translation.en: I could. But I don't wanna,
translation.zh: 我可以 但是我不想要

translation.en: 'cause I say we deserve better, man.
translation.zh: 因为我觉得我们应该过更好的生活

translation.en: How many times did we fly around with 20 million bucks at our feet
translation.zh: 多少次我们带着两千万的现金到处飞

translation.en: to pay off some cockroach somewhere, and we never took a dime?
translation.zh:
钱就在脚下 然后都给了一些人渣
我们一分都没拿？

translation.en: -Hell, you've been shot four times. -Five.
translation.zh:
-操 你还被打过四枪
-五枪

translation.en: You've been shot five times for your country,
translation.zh: 你为了你的国家被打过五枪

translation.en: and you can't even afford a new truck.
translation.zh: 现在你连一辆新卡车都买不起

translation.en: That's the real crime.
-Good to see you, Tess. -[Tess] Good to see you.
-You coming back? -Yeah, I'll be back in 20.
translation.zh: 你还会来吗？ 嗯 给我二十分钟 我先把她放下

translation.en: I gotta drop her off. Is Ironhead in?
translation.zh: 嗯 给我二十分钟 我先把她放下 铁头去吗？

translation.en: Only if you are.
-Just take a look. -Fine.
I'll take a look. Leave my truck outta this.
translation.zh: 我看一看吧 别再提我的卡车

translation.en: This isn't about my truck.
Yes, it is. That's exactly what this is about!
translation.zh: 有关系 完全和你的卡车有关系

translation.en: -Your mom will pick you up, okay? -Yep.
translation.zh:
-你妈会来接你 听到吗？
-好

translation.en: [Tom] Hey!
I love you.
I miss you.
-[William] What'd he say? -He's taking a look at it.
translation.zh: 他怎么说？ 他说他看一看

translation.en: He may not be up for this.
[William] You know he's the best with something this complex.
translation.zh:
你也知道这么复杂的情况
他是最厉害的

translation.en: And he needs this right now.
[Santiago] All right.
[scoffs] This shit is fuckin' depressing.
C'mon.
Let your brother have some fun. Support him.
translation.zh: 让你弟弟玩玩 支持他一下

translation.en: [William] I've been supporting him since the day he was born.
translation.zh: 从他出生那天起 我就一直在支持他

translation.en: -[door opens] -That kid's a one-in-a-million talent,
translation.zh: 这孩子是万里挑一的天才

translation.en: going out there, playing the fucking clown to a bunch of hillbillies.
translation.zh: 结果在这里给一帮乡巴佬当小丑

translation.en: where are my corner men?
translation.zh: 喂 我的后援在哪儿呢？

translation.en: Holy shit, look who it is!
translation.zh: 我的天 看看谁来了！

translation.en: [Santiago] What's up, Benny? Oh, holy shit!
translation.zh: 班尼 你怎么样？天呐

translation.en: [groans] Oh, God!
Hell of a night for you to show.
-It's great to see you, man. -You as well.
[in Spanish] Hey! Every day you're uglier.
[Santiago chuckles] Ah, you little shithead.
Good to see you.
[Santiago, in English] Did you boys get my text?
-Yeah? -[man chuckles]
Fish?
I need a pilot. I can't do this thing without you.
translation.zh: 我需要个飞行员 没你我干不了

translation.en: I don't know, man. I got the new baby now,
translation.zh: 哥们 我说不好 我刚刚有个宝宝

translation.en: and my lady isn't into me doing this kinda shit anymore.
translation.zh: 我家那位不支持我再干那种活了

translation.en: What-- What does that mean?
Did you read the text? This can change you and that baby's life forever.
translation.zh:
你看短信了吗？
这可能会永远改变你和宝宝的生活

translation.en: What happened to that bullshit about going back to your mother's homeland
translation.zh: 之前不是说什么回到祖国

translation.en: and empowering the people to police themselves?
translation.zh:
帮助那里的人管理自己的屁话
现在怎么了？

translation.en: Anyway, I lost my license. I can't even fly right now.
translation.zh: 再说 我丢了执照 现在也飞不了了

translation.en: Well, I don't need a pilot with a license.
translation.zh: 我不需要一个有执照的飞行员

translation.en: I'm in with the army down there. I just need a pilot I can trust.
translation.zh:
我和那里的军队合作 我只需要一个
能信任的飞行员

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think so.
[Santiago sighs, chuckles] Okay. Lorea is destroying that country.
translation.zh: 好吧 洛雷亚在毁灭他们的国家

translation.en: So we get to take out a very bad man, and, oh, by the way,
translation.zh: 我们要做的只是干掉一个很坏的坏蛋

translation.en: there's a winning lottery ticket stuck to the bottom of your cowboy boot.
translation.zh: 而且最后还能像买彩票中个大奖一样

translation.en: Every guy in that gym would jump at this.
translation.zh: 这是每个人都求之不得的机会

translation.en: Come on, focus, guys! It's fight night.
translation.zh: 专心点 大家 今晚是比赛夜

translation.en: Yeah, don't worry about that bullshit.
translation.zh: 嗯 你别管这些狗屁

translation.en: Sorry, Benny.
You ready for this?
-Hell yeah. -[bell dings]
[William] Let's go.
-I didn't mean to call your shit bullshit. -[chuckles] It's all right.
translation.zh: 我不是想说你说的是狗屁 没事的

translation.en: I got busted.
It's not a big deal.
Actually, it's a big deal.
Coke?
[scoffs] Jesus, Frankie.
Technically, it's a suspension. I'm still under review.
translation.zh: 严格来讲 是暂扣 还在审查中

translation.en: Well, what about you? What are you gonna do?
I said if Redfly's in, I'm in.
translation.zh: 我说过如果红苍蝇去的话 我也去

translation.en: -Come on, stick with me here, guys. -Oh, I'm with you, Benny.
translation.zh: 喂 大家专注点 班尼 我支持你

translation.en: But are you with me?
Are you in?
You know I am.
-[pats back] -I go where you go.
That's what I thought. Benny stands tall.
translation.zh: 我想也是 班尼就是个勇士

translation.en: [announcer over PA] From Red Feather Lakes, Colorado,
translation.zh: 来自科罗拉多的红羽重量

translation.en: standing six foot three, weighing in at 195 pounds,
I bring you... Ben Miller!
-Come on! [shouts] -[crowd cheering]
Let's go, Benny!
Cheers, man.
Benny, take it easy! Nice and slow!
translation.zh: 班尼 小心 稳住

translation.en: I took a look at your folder. It's good work.
translation.zh: 我看了看你的计划 弄得不错

translation.en: Thank you.
You need five guys and a pilot.
translation.zh: 你需要五个人和一个飞行员

translation.en: Go! Get him, Benny!
[William] What's up, brother?
The only thing missing is your entry plan.
I have a full set of bullshit passports waiting for us.
translation.zh: 我给我们每人弄了一整套假护照

translation.en: We go through immigration as power line consultants.
translation.zh: 我们作为电力顾问过海关

translation.en: Once we're in-country,
they don't have any facial recognition cameras yet, so...
translation.zh: 他们没有面部识别摄像头

translation.en: we're ghosts.
So what's the verdict?
I'm in for the recce if you guys are.
translation.zh: 如果你们都去的话 我也去侦查

translation.en: -[Santiago] You sure? -Yeah, just the recce though.
translation.zh: 确定？ 嗯 但只做侦查 不开火

translation.en: No live fire.
translation.zh: 嗯 但只做侦查 不开火

translation.en: -That's all right. -Okay.
[Santiago] Fish?
When is it?
We leave Thursday.
[sighs] Okay.
[announcer] And here we go!
[Tom] Come on, Benny! Let's go!
-All right, it's time to work. -[bell dings]
translation.zh: 好样的 班尼 该开工了

translation.en: Comms.
Pass those out.
We're in Lorea's backyard.
translation.zh: 我们现在在洛雷亚的后院

translation.en: So what's this guy got against banks? At least a safe.
translation.zh:
所以这家伙为什么不用袋子？
最起码用个保险箱

translation.en: [Santiago over radio] The house is the safe.
[Benny] I'm at the gate.
This looks like everything was done about 82% right.
translation.zh: 看上去所有的东西都只弄对了82%

translation.en: They got all the toys out here, but these cameras aren't even aimed
translation.zh: 东西都齐了 但是这些摄像头

translation.en: at the weakest breach point.
translation.zh: 都没对准最薄弱的攻击点

translation.en: [Tom] Your girlfriend's making her normal money drop?
translation.zh: 你女朋友会像平常那样来送钱？

translation.en: [Santiago] Yeah.
She's prepared to record the inside of the house.
translation.zh: 她会录下来房子里面的情况

translation.en: [Frankie] Pope...
Pope, I have kids over here. Does he have kids living in here with him?
translation.zh:
教皇 我看到小孩了
他和孩子们一起住？

translation.en: 'Cause that's gonna make things a whole lot more complicated
translation.zh: 这下情况会变得格外复杂

translation.en: and is not what I signed up for.
The family's not the problem. They're the answer.
translation.zh: 家人不是问题 他们是答案

translation.en: [Frankie] Why?
[Santiago] Church.
Lorea's very devout.
Every Sunday morning,
translation.zh: 每个周日早上 他会

translation.en: he sends three guards to the 6:00 a.m. service.
translation.zh: 派三个卫兵去六点的主日崇拜

translation.en: When they get back, he sends the rest of the team,
translation.zh: 等他们回来 他再派剩下的人

translation.en: along with his family, into town to mass.
translation.zh: 还有他的家人进去城里参加弥撒

translation.en: That leaves him
and three guards in that house, and that's our window.
translation.zh:
就剩他一个人和三个卫兵
这就是我们的机会

translation.en: Why would he do that?
[Santiago] Worried about someone taking his kids.
translation.zh: 他担心有人会绑架他的孩子

translation.en: And he never leaves his money.
Also, I don't think he believes anyone actually has the balls
translation.zh: 另外 我想他不相信会有人有胆量

translation.en: to come out here and rob him.
It's probably 'cause it's a stupid idea.
translation.zh: 也许是因为这本身就是个很蠢的想法

translation.en: [Benny] Pope, I got your girlfriend coming up right now.
translation.zh: 教皇 我看见你女朋友来了

translation.en: Holy shit.
She is beautiful, man.
I fucking knew it.
Fuck off.
[William whispers] God damn.
I got an execution about to go down over here.
Are you at the tennis courts?
[William] Yeah.
Yeah, that's his spot.
translation.zh: 嗯 那就是他常用的地方

translation.en: [Frankie] Why is she doing this?
[Santiago] She hopes I can get her little brother out of jail.
translation.zh: 她希望我能把她弟弟弄出监狱

translation.en: [Benny] Did you put him in jail?
-[Santiago] Not really. -Buenas.
[Tom] I'm guessing that's putting her at some risk.
translation.zh: 我猜这给她带来了风险

translation.en: [Frankie] Man, I almost forgot why I got out of this business.
translation.zh: 我差点忘了我之前为什么退役的

translation.en: Shit gets so dark so quick.
Oh, shit, we got ground sensors here, boys.
translation.zh: 该死 这里有地面感应器

translation.en: [Santiago] Did you hit one?
I don't know, I'm not sure.
Benny, I got two guys on motorbikes coming your way.
translation.zh:
班尼 两个骑摩托车的人
朝你那边开去了

translation.en: [William] Hold tight, Benny. I'm trying to get out there to cover you.
translation.zh: 班尼 耐心等待 我这就过去掩护你

translation.en: [informant, in Spanish] Good afternoon, Mr. Lorea.
translation.zh: 洛雷亚先生 下午好

translation.en: [in English] A stock boy job at Walmart's starting to look pretty good right now, boys.
translation.zh:
突然觉得
在沃尔玛管理货品的工作也不错

translation.en: [in Spanish] It looks good to me.
Good.
Thank you, sir.
[in English] I'm clear. They're coming back to you.
translation.zh: 我安全了 他们朝你开回去了

translation.en: [sighs] Let's get the fuck outta here.
[Frankie] You were gonna piss yourself.
I was getting onto the déjà vu part, man.
translation.zh: 我正准备说似曾相识的部分

translation.en: [William] So what's the plan?
Are their guys prepared to operate across the border?
translation.zh: 他们准备好跨境行动了吗？

translation.en: What's the scope of this thing?
Sunday soft hit is the way to do it.
translation.zh: 最好的办法就是周日突袭

translation.en: Otherwise, you bring in an army, you'd start a fucking war up there.
translation.zh:
不然你带一只军队进去
挑起的是一场战争

translation.en: Mm-hmm. So, when do you need to present to the agency down here?
translation.zh:
所以你什么时候
要给这里的代理演示计划？

translation.en: [clicks tongue] I'm not sure I wanna tell them.
translation.zh: 我不确定我要告诉他们

translation.en: Why?
[Santiago] We saw the place.
It's full of holes.
So maybe we don't tell them...
translation.zh: 所以也许我们不需要告诉他们

translation.en: -[Benny chuckles] -...and we do this thing ourselves.
What?
-[Santiago] What? -[Benny sighs]
Now, we each took 17 grand...
translation.zh: 我们每个人拿了一万七

translation.en: to help the narcotics unit map out and plan this fuckin' thing.
translation.zh: 来帮助稽毒部队画地图 计划这个行动

translation.en: I told you I wasn't even comfortable helping them do it.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你我原本就不太想帮这帮人

translation.en: Now you want us to do it by ourselves? Kill a bunch of fuckin' narcos?
translation.zh: 现在你想我们自己干？ 干掉一帮他妈的毒贩？

translation.en: If we hit that window, like you said, when they're at church,
translation.zh:
如果我们像你说的 抓住周日的机会
大部分人在教堂

translation.en: nobody but Lorea gets killed.
translation.zh: 我们只需要干掉洛雷亚

translation.en: [Santiago] And I'm okay with that.
[Tom] Does the agency down here even know about this?
translation.zh: 这边的代理知道这件事吗？

translation.en: -What do you mean? -Come on, man!
translation.zh: 什么意思？ 哥们 说吧 别他妈的吞吞吐吐的

translation.en: Don't fuck around.
translation.zh: 哥们 说吧 别他妈的吞吞吐吐的

translation.en: Who paid our fees?
It's complicated, technically...
translation.zh: 有点复杂 严格来讲…

translation.en: you guys were paid through an LLC.
translation.zh: 你们是通过一个有限责任公司付的

translation.en: Mm, no, not that complicated. It's $100,000. Where the fuck did it come from?
translation.zh:
别 没那么复杂 就是十万块
钱他妈的从哪里来的？

translation.en: [Santiago] I'll get the bill.
Thanks.
Great trip, boys. [sighs] It's turning out to be some full-on cowboy shit.
translation.zh:
这次行动真不错
完全变成一次胡闯乱搞了

translation.en: Whose money is it, huh?
-It was my money. -Jeez.
[Frankie, in Spanish] What were you thinking?
[in English] What? Does that change anything?
Yeah, man.
You fucking lied to us.
No, I didn't lie to you.
[softly] I asked you guys to come down here,
do reconnaissance, and make a plan.
Now, we can execute that plan alone
translation.zh: 现在我们可以按计划自己行动

translation.en: and take all of the money,
or you guys can fuck off, and I'll bring the team from down here in.
translation.zh:
或者你们可以滚蛋
我再找一个这里的团队行动

translation.en: But I assure you, if I do that, this fucker will find out about it,
translation.zh:
但我确定 如果我那样做的话
这个混蛋一定会得到风声

translation.en: and he'll be gone, and I need this guy.
translation.zh: 他一定跑路 我需要抓到他

translation.en: You know how many fucking bad men are out there all over the world?
translation.zh: 你知道这个世界上有多少坏蛋吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, this is my last one.
translation.zh: 嗯 这是我最后一个

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -[Santiago] And you may not believe it,
but I have been here for the last three years of my life,
translation.zh: 但过去三年里 我一直在这里

translation.en: trying to make a difference, but it's a fucking mess.
translation.zh:
想给这里做点改变
但这里还是一塌糊涂

translation.en: And it's all because of Lorea.
The thought of leaving everything we've done behind for the last 17 years,
translation.zh: 一想到我们过去十七年里所做的一切

translation.en: with nothing to show for it--
-Fuck you, nothing to show for it. -[scoffs]
Look, if...
If we had accomplished half the things that we've accomplished
translation.zh:
如果我们能在任何其它职业
干出一半我们的成绩

translation.en: in any other profession, we'd be set for life.
translation.zh: 我们会一辈子衣食无忧

translation.en: Hey, man, that's the deal we cut.
translation.zh: 喂 兄弟 那是我们要做的牺牲

translation.en: -Well, it's a shitty deal. -Yeah, well...
Because this man's a goddamn hero,
translation.zh: 因为这家伙是个他妈的英雄

translation.en: and he can't even send his kids to college.
translation.zh: 然而他都没法把孩子送去上大学

translation.en: And Fish's the most talented pilot I know, and he's grounded on a bullshit coke rap.
translation.zh:
鲶鱼是我认识的最厉害的飞行员
却因为狗屁可卡因被调销执照

translation.en: And how many times can your brother get the shit knocked out of him for--
translation.zh: 你弟弟要被暴打多少次 就为了几百…

translation.en: I didn't get the shit beat out of me. I won that fight.
translation.zh: 我没有被暴打 那场我赢了

translation.en: Sorry, Benny.
And how many more pep talks can you possibly give?
I'm done, man.
Both knees are shot.
That neck operation I got last year made the whole thing worse.
translation.zh: 去年的脖子手术之后 身体更不好了

translation.en: So, the question is,
do we finally get to use our skills for our own benefit
translation.zh:
我们是否最终利用我们的技能
为自己谋点利

translation.en: and actually change something?
translation.zh: 来真正改变我们的生活？

translation.en: So, are we doing this?
[Tom] How the fuck am I supposed to know?
This guy doesn't come through with the one key piece of intel
translation.zh: 这小子还没有拿到最重要的情报

translation.en: we need to make this decision.
For all we know,
translation.zh: 也许她在给我们设个圈套

translation.en: she could be setting us up to get her brother back.
translation.zh:
也许她在给我们设个圈套 -只为了救她弟弟而已
-明天就知道了

translation.en: We'll know tomorrow.
translation.zh:
-只为了救她弟弟而已
-明天就知道了

translation.en: She should have been recording that whole thing today.
translation.zh: 她今天应该都录下来了

translation.en: All right, if it does come back clean,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果结果没问题的话

translation.en: how would you do the Sunday morning version?
translation.zh: 你准备怎么开展周日行动？

translation.en: -I haven't thought about it. -Bullshit, you can't help yourself.
translation.zh: 我还没想好 狗屁 你肯定早就想好了

translation.en: All right.
In the first pop, you'd have 40 minutes to get in, get the job done,
translation.zh:
这次迅速行动
我们有四十分钟时间进去完成任务

translation.en: and get out before the family comes home from church.
translation.zh: 在家人从教堂回来之前出来

translation.en: That's a hard out.
We need to breach the fence,
sweep the premises, find and subdue the guards,
translation.zh: 搜索区域 找到并制服卫兵

translation.en: scrub the hard drives in the security room,
get rid of Lorea, find the money, pack the money into 18 hundred-pound bags,
translation.zh:
解决掉洛雷亚 找到钱
把钱放进816公斤的袋子里

translation.en: and then hoof it half a mile to the nearest vehicle.
translation.zh: 然后拖八百米到最近的车

translation.en: There's only two ways out:
the fence in the front, or over the mountain we came down, and I'm too old for that.
translation.zh:
从前面的栅栏 翻下我们走过的山
我太老了 干不了这个

translation.en: We need to use one of their vans.
translation.zh: 我们需要用一辆他们的面包车

translation.en: [Frankie] There were two vans in the courtyard.
But if the family uses those vans to go to church, then we got nothing.
translation.zh:
但是如果他家人开它们去教堂
那我们就没戏了

translation.en: So we need another van.
translation.zh: 所以我们还需要一辆面包车

translation.en: -Can your girl work that out? -I can ask her.
translation.zh: 你的女友能解决这件事吗？ 我问问她

translation.en: Still got your aviation guy down here?
translation.zh: 你的航空导游还能联系上吗？

translation.en: 'Cause we would need a heavy-lift helicopter in 32 hours
translation.zh: 因为我们需要一个能负重的直升机

translation.en: to get us over the Andes and to the ocean.
translation.zh:
32小时内带我们越过安第斯山
飞到海边

translation.en: I don't know, but I'll give him a call.
translation.zh: 不知道 我给他打个电话看看

translation.en: [Benny] Oh, yeah! Big dog is back!
translation.zh: 太棒了 老大重出江湖了

translation.en: Redfly's gonna be rich, boys!
translation.zh: 红苍蝇要发财了 兄弟们

translation.en: Now we're talkin'.
[in Spanish] Hello.
-Thank you. Have a good day. -[vendor speaking Spanish]
-[Santiago, in English] Thank you. -That's it?
[Santiago] I don't know.
[in Spanish] Miss, two coffees, please.
-[in English] My brother. -[Santiago] Yeah.
I might need you to do one more thing for me.
translation.zh: 我可能还需要你再做一件事情

translation.en: Can you get an extra van...
into the compound, Sunday morning?
If I did that, they're going to know it's me.
translation.zh: 如果这样的话 他们会知道是我

translation.en: And everyone who works for him ends up dead, sooner or later.
translation.zh: 而且他下面的人迟早都是死路一条

translation.en: If you can get me an extra van in there Sunday morning...
translation.zh:
如果你能在周日上午
给我弄一辆面包车

translation.en: I will get you and your brother out of the country
translation.zh: 我会给你和你弟弟弄到新护照和钱

translation.en: with new papers and money.
How much?
Two million.
Two million?
[Santiago] Yes.
And you'll only have a couple hours to get my brother?
translation.zh: 你只有几个小时救我弟弟？

translation.en: I'll find a way.
But I need that van inside those gates.
translation.zh: 但是我需要你把车弄进大门里

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
-Yeah? -[informant] Yes. I'll get the van.
But if we're not gone forever after you make your move, we are dead.
translation.zh:
但如果我们不能永远消失
你一旦行动 我们就死定了

translation.en: You'll be gone.
Yeah.
Thank you.
[Santiago] Hey, fellas.
Take a look at this.
[chuckles] Jesus, Pope!
-What the hell were you planning here? -Exactly this.
translation.zh: 你在这里计划些什么？ 就是这个

translation.en: Every single gun, bullet, and fucking toothpick here's been sourced in-country.
translation.zh:
每一只枪、子弹、甚至他妈的牙签
都是在这个国家弄来的

translation.en: The idea is to pin this on a local rival gang.
translation.zh:
目的是把这次行动
嫁祸到当地的敌对帮派

translation.en: Now, who was it that didn't trust this lady?
translation.zh: 是谁不相信这位女士的？

translation.en: 'Cause not only is she going to get us that extra van, but she got us this.
translation.zh:
因为她不仅仅会给我们弄到车
还给我们弄来了这个

translation.en: There's our man, Lorea.
translation.zh: 这就是我们的目标 洛雷亚

translation.en: And, oh!
Look at what's there behind him.
translation.zh: 看到他后面是什么了吗？

translation.en: -[Lorea speaking on recording] -Looks like money to me.
-There's gotta be about 35 million there. -We don't know that.
translation.zh: 那起码是三千五百万 这可说不好

translation.en: Whatever it is, it's a lot.
translation.zh: 不管多少 那是一大笔钱

translation.en: What are you gonna do with your share, huh?
Never spend your money until it's in your pocket, Benjamin.
translation.zh:
班杰明 钱还没到手呢
先别想那么多

translation.en: [Benny] Well, I'm just sayin', I'm gonna get that Ferrari, man.
translation.zh: 我就是想说 我准备弄台法拉利

translation.en: -[Frankie] How original. -What about the bird?
translation.zh: 真是不俗 那直升机呢？

translation.en: Well, he said if we're there with three million bucks, he'll be there.
translation.zh:
他说如果我们带三百万去
直升机就会在

translation.en: So we got a bird, we got a van,
translation.zh: 我们有直升机 我们有面包车

translation.en: we got Lorea confirmed in the house with the money.
translation.zh: 我们确定了洛雷亚和钱都在房子里

translation.en: All right, give me-- give me a minute.
Uh, you know, if you had pulled this shit when we were active duty,
translation.zh:
你知道吗 如果我们还在服役的话
冲你这个点子

translation.en: I would have court-martialed your ass.
Look, why don't we all just have a dinner tonight,
translation.zh: 这样吧 我们晚上吃个饭

translation.en: get drunk, on me, and you all can go home in the morning?
translation.zh:
好好喝一顿 我请客
然后你们早上可以回家

translation.en: Nah, fuck that.
[sighs] I can't.
Somehow, I just...
...ended up against it here. You know?
translation.zh: 在这里改变了想法了 你知道吗？

translation.en: I'm burning through my pension. Molly's job doesn't cut it.
translation.zh: 我的退休金快没了 茉莉的工资也不够

translation.en: I can't sell condos to save my fucking life.
translation.zh:
我卖不出去公寓
来拯救我该死的生活

translation.en: The only thing I have is taking care of these girls.
translation.zh: 我唯一能做的就是照顾好女儿

translation.en: [Santiago] Yeah.
Yeah, I understand that.
Fuck, I missed this.
translation.zh: 妈的 我一直怀念这种生活

translation.en: It's like they take your best 20 years, and then spit you out.
translation.zh:
就好像他们夺走了你最好的二十年
然后把你赶出来

translation.en: Yeah.
[Tom] I just can't stop thinking about the mistakes.
translation.zh: 但我总是会去想犯过的错误

translation.en: -[Santiago] What mistakes? -[sighs] Fuck, man.
translation.zh: 什么错误？ 妈的 哥们

translation.en: All of 'em.
-Didn't get better when you got out? -[Tom] No.
translation.zh: 你退役后 没感觉好一些？ 没有

translation.en: Only thing that made it feel better is when you put a gun in my hand.
translation.zh:
唯一让我感觉好点的
就是你把枪放在我手里时

translation.en: [clicks tongue] So, I guess that's what we'll do.
translation.zh: 所以 我想就这么办

translation.en: [Tom] All right, first things first:

translation.zh: 试试外面的卸载装置 在墙上！

translation.en: Pull the lever, Ben!
It didn't work!
[Frankie] There should be a manual override
translation.zh: 货钩上面应该还有一个

translation.en: on the cargo hook.
Let me through!
-[William] Benny! -[screams]
All right, I'm gonna try to land here.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会试试降落这边

translation.en: I gotta jump!
-[yells] -[William] Benny!
Bad landing.
Fish! Fish!
-You all right? -Yeah, I think so. I think so.
Yo, Benny!
-Benny! -[Santiago grunts]
-[Benny] I'm here! -[Santiago] Come on, we gotta move.
translation.zh: 我在这里！ 过来 我们得走了

translation.en: -Come on! -[Frankie groans]
[William grunts] Let's get our shit outta here.
[Santiago] Try and get up to it.
-[Benny] Fish! -I need oxygen. [grunts]
-[clamoring in distance] -[Tom] Everybody okay?
[Santiago and William] Yeah.
-[Tom] They're into the fucking net. -What's the plan here?
translation.zh: 他们在打开网 我们什么计划？

translation.en: [Tom] We're gonna get that money over that mountain to the ocean.
translation.zh: 我们拿上钱 越过山 去海边

translation.en: Benny, cover us from under that tree line there.
translation.zh: 班尼 去森林线那边掩护我们

translation.en: -Fish, you take position up there. -[William grunts]
translation.zh: 鲶鱼 去上边找个位置

translation.en: That's cocaine they're growing, so they may have weapons trained on us
translation.zh: 他们在种可卡因 所以他们 可能有枪从那边的房子对着我们

translation.en: from those buildings right there.
translation.zh: 可能有枪从那边的房子对着我们

translation.en: We got working radios?
-No, comms are dead. -[Tom] Go with hand signals.
translation.zh:
-不行了 通信器坏了
-用手势

translation.en: Pope and I will get out there and look as peaceful as we can.
translation.zh: 教皇和我过去 尽量平和点

translation.en: We'll give you a hand signal when we think it's secure.
translation.zh: 如果安全的话 我们会给一个手势

translation.en: -Let's move. -[William] Benny.
[in Spanish] Please step back. Sirs!
Step back, please, that is not yours.
translation.zh: 后退 这不是你们的

translation.en: Who are you?
Who are you with?
We're with the army.
We are advisers.
You should call a rescue helicopter.
translation.zh: 你应该叫一个急救直升机

translation.en: -It's coming. -Yes.
In the meantime, you are alone and don't have any uniforms.
translation.zh: 所以这段时间 就你们几个 而且没穿军装

translation.en: Okay, that can be resolved.
But what about the other passengers from the accident?
We can talk about that.
But tell your people to stop stealing our property.
translation.zh: 但是告诉你的人停止偷我们的东西

translation.en: These are our lands.
You fucked up, DEA.
No, no, no. Calm down. Calm down.
Sir, careful with that weapon.
translation.zh: 先生 小心那个武器

translation.en: -We're not DEA. We're not DEA. -[man] We are calm.
translation.zh: 我们不是缉毒局的 喂 你们有后援 对吧？

translation.en: -[man] Tell your guy to put his gun down. -[Santiago] Stay calm. Stop.
translation.zh:
喂 你们有后援 对吧？ -冷静 住手
-我们很冷静 拜托

translation.en: [in English] Pope, what's he reaching for? A weapon?
translation.zh: 教皇 他在拿什么？是武器吗？

translation.en: Pope, do you cop--
[in Spanish] Stay right there. Don't get any closer.
[in English] Fuck! What the hell, man?
-[in Spanish] Assholes! Murderers! -[Santiago] Get out of there!
-[in English] Fuck! -[woman shouts in Spanish] No! [sobs]
We need horses or mules, please, and then we will get out of here.
translation.zh:
拜托 我们只需要马和骡子
然后我们就走

translation.en: [in English] Benny, get these people back up toward the village.
translation.zh: 班尼 把这些人带去村里

translation.en: Fish, get this money on some mules. Let's get the fuck out of here.
translation.zh:
鲶鱼 把钱放骡子上
我们他妈的赶快走

translation.en: [Frankie, in Spanish] Get back!
Get up!
-[Santiago] Get up! Get up, lady! -[shouts]
[farmer] Send me to God.
[Santiago, in English] Go! Keep going!
[sighs] Fuck.
All right, let's get these donkeys saddled up, get the bags on 'em.
translation.zh: 给这些驴装上鞍子 袋子放上去

translation.en: Where's Pope?
He's up there.
[Santiago, in Spanish] That is for the mules.
That is for the families.
That is for you.
Are we in agreement?
Good.
We're very sorry for what happened.
translation.zh: 我们很抱歉发生了这种事

translation.en: And we very much appreciate your cooperation.
translation.zh: 我们非常感谢你的合作

translation.en: [clicks tongue, in English] Come on.
Sorry, kid.
[in Spanish] Those men have paid their debt!
translation.zh: 那些人已经付了他们的债

translation.en: Let them pass.
[William, in English] Did you pay for the damage?
translation.zh: 你给他们赔偿损失了吗？

translation.en: [Tom] Yeah.
[William] How much?
[Tom] Two hundred for the animals. A million for the families.
translation.zh: 牲口两百万 每个家庭一百万

translation.en: Which one of you shot first?
I don't know.
We need to watch ourselves here.
Yeah, we do.
What the hell does that mean?
Nothin'.
It just means we gotta watch ourselves, that's all.
translation.zh:
意思就是我们需要注意点自己
就这样

translation.en: Roger that.
How far have we gone?
We've gone about 12 clicks.
To get to the boat, it's another day and a half, maybe two.
translation.zh: 到达船那里还需要一天半 也许两天

translation.en: Well, a fire would be righteous.
translation.zh: 现在要是有点火就太好了

translation.en: Lorea's guys will be on our tail.
translation.zh: 洛雷亚的人在追踪我们

translation.en: Smoke from a fire will give us away. We cold camp.
translation.zh:
点火的烟会暴露我们
我们要不生火野营

translation.en: Well, we're dancing with the devil now.
translation.zh: 我们现在是和恶魔共舞

translation.en: [Frankie] Dancing?
We were dancing when we got on the plane to come down here.
translation.zh: 我们上飞机就已经在共舞了

translation.en: I would call this full intercourse. [chuckles]
[Benny] How you doing, bud?
Golden. [sighs]
Here.
[William] You're a good man, Benny.
We're a dyin' breed, boys.
[Benny] No, we're not.
The world's always going to need somebody to go door-to-door to hold the line.
translation.zh:
这个世界总是需要能一家一家
维持秩序的人

translation.en: Cops go door-to-door and hold the line.
translation.zh: 警察就是一家一家维持秩序的人

translation.en: We were warriors.
Well, it's hard to remember that sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时候很难想起这一点

translation.en: Yeah, it is.
What are you talking about?
I was too quick on the trigger. You know it, and I know it.
translation.zh: 我太急于开枪了 你我都知道

translation.en: I killed those people.
No, you didn't.
We all did.
[Santiago] This is definitely the old smuggler's trail!
translation.zh: 这绝对是以前走私者走的山路

translation.en: We should just keep following it all the way up.
Come on.
Stop pushing on me, man. It's steep here.
translation.zh: 别逼我这么紧 这里很陡峭的

translation.en: Obviously, man, we're on the side of a fucking mountain!
translation.zh: 可不是 我们在他妈的山的侧面

translation.en: Just shut up and concentrate! Jesus Christ!
translation.zh: 闭嘴 别分心 老天爷！

translation.en: -Come on, just go. -Fuck you.
-[mule brays] -[William] Oh, really?
Keep going!
-[Tom] Stop. -[Benny] You wanna do this?
Oh, fuck!
-[Benny laughs] -What the fuck are you laughing at?
That was a living animal, man.
translation.zh: 哥们 那可是个活生生的动物

translation.en: It could have been any one of us. You're worried about the fucking donkey?
translation.zh: 本来可能是我们其中一个掉下去 你在担心一个他妈的驴子？

translation.en: You need to get your shit straight here, man.
translation.zh: 哥们 你需要冷静点

translation.en: -What? Me? -[Santiago] Yeah, you.
[Tom] You're pointing fingers at me?
-You're the reason we're in this mess. -Oh, how the fuck is that?
translation.zh:
-我们才在这个烂摊子里
-你他妈的什么意思？

translation.en: Yeah, you had to grab every dollar you could get your hands on, didn't you?
translation.zh: 对 你每一块钱都想带走 是不是？

translation.en: You could have gotten Lorea two months ago! We didn't need to be here.
translation.zh:
你两个月前就可以干掉洛雷亚！
这样我们不会来这里了

translation.en: [Santiago] All right.
Fucking bullshit!
We're all on the hook, are we not?
translation.zh: 我们所有人都有责任 没错吧？

translation.en: [Tom] God damn this fucking horse! Stop it!
-Yes. It's fine. -Relax. Relax.
We're not picking at the fucking scab right now, okay?
translation.zh:
我们现在先不要在伤口撒盐了
行吧？

translation.en: One foot in front of the other.
All right? Come on.
Let's go. Jesus fucking Christ.
Are you sure you want me to get rid of the mules?
[William] This rock side's 20-foot deep. We're not getting the mules through.
translation.zh: 这块岩石有六米高 骡子没法上来

translation.en: Yeah, it's on us now!
translation.zh: 嗯 现在只能靠我们自己了

translation.en: [Santiago] Look at the mules.
Well, if we can get over this,
translation.zh: 嗯 如果我们能翻过这个

translation.en: it should be all downhill to the ocean from here.
translation.zh: 应该都是下坡路一直到海边了

translation.en: [Santiago] I got it. I got it. I got it.
[Santiago] All right, come on up!
-Nice work. -You, too.
Look, I talked a lot of shit back there.
translation.zh: 我刚才说了很多狗屁话

translation.en: I didn't mean that.
-Don't worry about it. -No, no, it's...
This is on me.
-It's... all on me. -No, man, it's...
translation.zh:
-都是我的错
-不 哥们 这是…

translation.en: I'm on the hook for this.
You know? It is what it is. [sniffles]
Yeah, it is what it is.
-I am a bit of a dick, though. -[chuckles]
You could freeze an Eskimo's asshole out here.
translation.zh:
这里可以冷的可以冻住一个
爱斯基摩人的屁眼了

translation.en: I demand a fire.
[sighs] We cold camp.
Fuck you.
This is my "fuck you" money.
Dude, what the fuck are you doing?
[laughing] We don't have enough men to carry this money,
translation.zh: 我们人手不够运这些钱 那还不如用来取暖呢

translation.en: so we might as well be warm. [sniffles]
Oh, Jesus.
-[Frankie] That's more like it. -[Santiago] Este loco...
-Oh! Oh, my God! Holy shit. -[all laugh]
[Tom] Now that's a fire!
-[Tom] Oh, shit! Shit. -[William] Ah, Fuck.
[Benny] I'm hit!
-[William] Benny, you all right? -Yeah, I'm fine. Just grazed my shoulder.
translation.zh: 班尼 你没事吧？ 嗯 没事 只是擦伤了肩膀

translation.en: Shooter's up on the ridge line.
Oh, he likes me so much. I'll stay here, hold his fire.
translation.zh:
他太喜欢我了
我就呆在这里吸引火力

translation.en: You guys go around the side.
Pope, can you step out?
translation.zh: 教皇 你可以出去吗？

translation.en: Work up the trailhead.
All right.
Flank right, make sure no one else is coming up below.
translation.zh: 右边迂回 确认下面没有人上来

translation.en: I'll cut up behind you.
Benny, you all right?
[Benny] Yeah, I'm fine. We'll hold down here until you get into position.
translation.zh:
是的 我没事
我们在这里守着 等你到位

translation.en: I think Pope's in position right now.
translation.zh: 我觉得教皇已经到位了

translation.en: Yeah, let's move.
[Benny] Tom!
Tom!
Tom. Come on... Come on.
[sobbing] Come on, Tom. Come on, man.
translation.zh: 拜托 汤姆 拜托你

translation.en: Come on, man. Come on...
translation.zh: 拜托 老兄 拜托了

translation.en: [William] Let me see. Let me see.
[Benny] Oh, my God!
Let's get him wrapped up.
We need to keep moving.
-What the fuck are you talking about? -[sighs]
You're a heartless son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 你个没心没肺狗娘养的！

translation.en: It was your little fire that got him fucking killed!
translation.zh: 就是你的那堆火把他害死的！

translation.en: [quietly] Stop it.
Stop this shit. Stop this shit.
-[Benny shouting] -[Santiago] Fucking stop this!
Stop this shit! Stop it!
-Stop this shit! -[William] Fuck you, Benny! Fuck you!
It wasn't the fire that gave us away.
That kid was from the village.
translation.zh: 这个孩子是那个村里的

translation.en: He's been tracking us for days.
translation.zh: 他已经跟踪我们几天了

translation.en: He obviously wanted a clear shot at Tom.
translation.zh: 很明显他就想一枪打死汤姆

translation.en: He wanted him.
But we do have to get the fuck out of here,
translation.zh: 但我们必须继续他妈的往前走

translation.en: and we are taking all of that money with us.
translation.zh: 而且我们要带上所有的钱

translation.en: Tom's family deserves it!
translation.zh: 汤姆的家人应该得到这钱

translation.en: And so do we.
All right, let's wrap him up. We carry him down.
translation.zh: 好了 我们把他卷起来 带下山

translation.en: Rest in peace, brother.
You rest in peace. [sniffles]
[Benny] ♪ Somewhere there's a mother ♪
♪ Crying for her boy ♪
♪ He is an airborne ranger ♪
translation.zh: 他是一名空中突击队员

translation.en: ♪ With orders to deploy ♪
♪ Somewhere there's a father ♪
♪ Crying for his son ♪
♪ His son was an airborne ranger ♪
translation.zh: 他的儿子是一名空中突击队员

translation.en: ♪ With a war to be won ♪
♪ Somewhere there's a daughter ♪
♪ Crying for her dad ♪
♪ He was an airborne ranger ♪
translation.zh: 他是一名空中突击队员

translation.en: ♪ Now he's just a folded flag ♪
translation.zh: 而他现在只包裹着一面旗帜

translation.en: ♪ Don't you cry for him ♪
♪ He don't need your sympathy ♪
♪ He is an airborne ranger ♪
translation.zh: 他是一名空中突击队员

translation.en: ♪ It's the best that he can be ♪
♪ It's the best that he can be ♪
[Santiago] How late are we to meet the guy with the boat?
translation.zh: 我们和有船的那个人晚了几天碰面？

translation.en: Five days.
Jesus. You think he's still there?
translation.zh: 天呐 你觉得他还在吗？

translation.en: I can't see shit.
We need to get one of us down there.
translation.zh: 我们需要派一个人先下去

translation.en: Think one of you can make it there and back?
translation.zh: 我们中间有人能过去再回来吗？

translation.en: I'll go.
Your Spanish sucks, Benny.
translation.zh: 班尼 你的西班牙语很烂

translation.en: I got it.
[Santiago] You sure?
Three?
Yeah.
You're looking for the Hijo Pródigo.
Benny, watch your six.
You watch yours.
I'm gonna say something. Are you listening?
translation.zh: 我想说几句话 你们在听吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
We gotta get back on our game.
Enough of this. It stops now. You understand?
translation.zh: 不要再低迷 现在就要振作 明白吗？

translation.en: Copy that.
[Frankie] Good.
How many people do you think you've killed?
[Frankie] What?
[William] You heard me.
As many as I had to.
Why would you ever wanna know that?
translation.zh: 你为什么会想知道这个？

translation.en: -Forty-three. -Jesus!
Confirmed.
[Santiago] You keep count of everything, huh?
translation.zh: 你还在计算所有的东西？

translation.en: Yep.
How's your sleep?
I guess better than it should be.
You all right?
[Benny] The boat's there.
I gave him half the money.
I hope he waits.
I didn't go into town,
but it looks like whoever's in charge there...
translation.zh: 但是看起来 不管谁是首领

translation.en: has a... kindergarten army that's looking for us.
translation.zh: 他们组织了一个儿童军队在搜索我们

translation.en: -[William] How many of them? -Two or three pros,
translation.zh: 多少人？ 两三个专业的

translation.en: 20 heavily-armed teenagers.
translation.zh: 二十个重武装的青少年

translation.en: What about the next town over?
[Santiago] It's over 100 miles to the south.
I'm sure they've got every town covered anyway.
translation.zh: 反正我估计他们每个镇子都布好人了

translation.en: Must be what's left of Lorea's guys.
translation.zh: 应该是洛雷亚剩下的人

translation.en: So we go through 'em.
Through them?
What, do you mean we mow them all down?
translation.zh: 什么意思？把他们全干掉？

translation.en: What's the alternative here?
I'm not prepared to wipe out every teenager in that town
translation.zh: 我可没准备好干掉镇里 所有的青少年 仅仅为了这批货

translation.en: just to get through with this cargo.
translation.zh: 所有的青少年 仅仅为了这批货

translation.en: [Santiago] This cargo?
What about that cargo?
Will you do it for him?
Tom died for this money, and we're not leaving this country without it!
translation.zh:
汤姆为了这笔钱而死
我们不带着这笔钱就不能离开

translation.en: He didn't die for that money, he died because of it!
translation.zh:
他不是为了这笔钱而死的
他是因为这笔钱而死的

translation.en: [Benny] They're just kids, man.
translation.zh: 哥们 他们还是孩子

translation.en: Can't we carry it out through the dark?
translation.zh: 我们就不能带上货趁晚上溜过去吗？

translation.en: [William] It's over 100 bags. There's no way.
translation.zh: 不可能 这里有超过一百个袋子

translation.en: Let me talk to him.
Look, Benny's telling us these are kids, man.
translation.zh: 哥们 班尼是说他们还是孩子

translation.en: I can't believe... I can't believe I let this happen.
translation.zh:
我不敢相信…
我不敢相信我会让这种事发生

translation.en: Look, we all came here of our own free will.
translation.zh: 听好了 我们都是自愿来的

translation.en: Yeah, but...
I thought we could... I thought we could do this.
translation.zh:
我以为我们可以…
我以为我们可以办到

translation.en: Yeah.
And we got what we deserved.
I'm sorry.
Yeah, me, too.
-But we can't do this. -I know.
translation.zh:
-但是我们不能这样做
-我知道

translation.en: I know.
We can't just... go through 'em.
I don't know what I was saying.
translation.zh: 我不知道我刚才在想什么

translation.en: It's all right.
We've just gotta get Tom home.
translation.zh: 我们只需要把汤姆带回家

translation.en: That's all that matters.
How are we gonna do that?
[Santiago] We keep carrying him down.
translation.zh: 我们带上这些继续往下走

translation.en: We fill our days packs with whatever we can...
translation.zh: 我们只带上平时的装备

translation.en: Whatever we can carry, and that's it.
What do we do with the rest of it?
Fuck.
[exhales] Fuck me.
That'll work.
Snow will be coming in soon.
Nobody'll ever see it again.
Good.
All right, let's keep going.
[Santiago, softly] Let's put him down for a second.
[William] We're running behind.
Benny, you should go. The sun's coming up.
translation.zh: 班尼 你去吧 太阳快出来了

translation.en: [Santiago] We'll meet you down at the cove in 30.
translation.zh: 我们三十分钟后在海湾见

translation.en: -[Benny] All right. Be careful. -[William] Always.
[Benny, in Spanish] Thank you for waiting.
[captain] The boat is ready.
[William, in English] No, wait. Whoa.
Is there anyone?
-It looks abandoned. -Cover me.
translation.zh: 看上去是废弃的 掩护我

translation.en: [fighter] Stop! [in Spanish] Hands up!
-[in English] Stop! -Put your hands up! [Santiago, in Spanish] Wait! Wait!
Listen!
Little brother, be careful with that gun. Don't point it at me.
translation.zh: 小兄弟 小心那只枪 不要对着我

translation.en: [in English] I speak English! [grunts] What's in the bag? What is that?
translation.zh: 我讲英语 袋子… 袋子里是什么？

translation.en: [William] It's our friend.
-He's dead. -I call boss.
-[in Spanish] No, don't do that. -[in English] Stop!
translation.zh:
-我打给老大
-别 千万不要 停！别动

translation.en: [Santiago, in Spanish] We don't have any problem with you.
[in English] Right, guys?
-We don't have a problem with him. -No problem.
translation.zh:
-我们不想惹麻烦 对吗？
-不惹麻烦

translation.en: -I'm taking a shot. -No! No. Don't do that.
[in Spanish] It's okay.
[Santiago] Hey, calm down.
Dumbass!
-[Santiago] Where are the keys? -I don't know.
They just left me here with just the car and the radio. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 他们只留下了车和无线电给我

translation.en: [in English] Fuck!
-[Santiago, in Spanish] Are you sure? -Yes.
[Santiago] Are you lying?
[in English] Hey, hey, kid, just relax, all right?
translation.zh: 喂 孩子 放松点 好吗？

translation.en: [man over radio, in Spanish] Sixteen? Sixteen, is that you?
translation.zh: 十六号？十六号 是你吗？

translation.en: We're going to send someone.
[in English] Yes! Fuck yes!
Let's move. Let's get it outta here.
translation.zh: 好啦 走吧 赶紧离开这里

translation.en: -[Santiago] Grab his radio. -[William] Got it.
[Santiago, in Spanish] Here's a little advice:
Get away from these men. [Frankie, in English] Let's move!
[in Spanish] Go home. Get out of here. [Frankie] Vamos, Pope!
translation.zh:
-回家 离开这里
-快走啦 教皇！

translation.en: [in English] Did you give that fucking kid money?
translation.zh: 你刚才给那个该死的小孩钱？

translation.en: We should have killed that kid as soon as he saw our faces.
translation.zh:
他看见我们的脸的时候
我们就应该立刻干掉他

translation.en: We are not killing any more people.
I'll tell you right now, if we get to that beach and Ben isn't there,
translation.zh:
我现在就告诉你 如果我们到了海边
班尼要是不在

translation.en: I'm fucking killing people.
-All right, he'll be there. Fuck! -[car approaching]
translation.zh: 好的 他会在的 操！

translation.en: [William] Fuck.
-Come on! Come on! -Can we go?
What the hell is this?
Shit!
[teen on radio in Spanish] They crashed into us! Look out, be careful!
translation.zh: 他们撞到车了 听好 小心点 他们朝海边去了

translation.en: -They're heading to the beach. -[man on radio] They just passed.
translation.zh: 听好 小心点 他们朝海边去了 他们刚刚过去

translation.en: -Everybody head towards the palm trees. -[in English] What did he say?
translation.zh:
-所有人去棕榈树那边
-他说什么？

translation.en: -[Frankie] More are coming. -There's two vehicles!
All right, it should open up onto the beach any minute.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们应该马上到海边了

translation.en: Pope, shoot!
Fuck!
Shoot the driver! What is wrong with you?
translation.zh: 向司机开枪！ 你有毛病吗？

translation.en: -[in English] Left! -[man, in Spanish] They're firing!
Stay behind!
[in English] They're right on us!
Where are they?
Left! Left!
Left!
[William] Goddamn!
All right, here's the beach.
Where is he? Do you see him?
translation.zh: 他去哪里了？你看见他了吗？

translation.en: No, but the cove where we're supposed to meet him's about a mile up this beach.
translation.zh:
没有 但是说好碰头的海湾
离这里还有一个半公里

translation.en: Pope, kill them!
Just kill them!
There it is!
-Do I wave him in? -[William] Hell yeah!
translation.zh:
-我们要挥手让他过来吗？
-没错

translation.en: Go!
It looks like this is the end of the road.
[Frankie] I see it.
We gotta cross over the dune! Cross over the dune!
translation.zh: 穿过沙丘 穿过沙丘

translation.en: [woman] Minus the expenses, and our administrative fee,
translation.zh: 除去花销和我们的服务费

translation.en: that leaves $5,334,120...
translation.zh:
还剩下五百三十三万
四千一百二十美元

translation.en: cut five ways.
Which gives you five shares of $1,066,824.
translation.zh:
也就是每份一百零六万
六千八百二十四美元

translation.en: Oh, and I need all of your signatures on the fifth contract here.
translation.zh:
我还需要你们每个人
在这第五份合约上面签名

translation.en: It'll deposit the deceased's share into the Redfly Family Trust.
translation.zh:
它会把过世者的那一份
存进红苍蝇家庭基金

translation.en: Here you are.
I'd like you to please include my share into the family trust.
translation.zh: 我想把我的那份也存进那个家庭基金

translation.en: Me, too.
Thank you.
[woman] So, I will schedule all the payments to the family trust.
translation.zh: 我会安排所有的财款放进家庭基金

translation.en: Of course.
-Thank you. That's for you. -Thank you. I'll be in touch.
translation.zh: 谢谢 这是给你的 谢谢 我们再联系

translation.en: [sighs] So, what are you guys gonna do now?
translation.zh: 所以现在你们要做什么？

translation.en: I gotta get home. [chuckles]
Not without these.
That'll help. [chuckles]
[in Spanish] See you.
Take care of yourself.
[in English] See you, buddy.
Love you, man.
[clicks tongue] I love you, too.
-I'll see you in a bit, all right? -[Benny] See you.
So, what you gonna do now?
translation.zh: 所以你接下来准备做什么？

translation.en: [sighs] I don't know.
Maybe I'll, uh...
I'll go see this girl I know in Australia.
translation.zh: 我会去澳大利亚找一个我认识的女孩

translation.en: Yeah, you should. I hear she recently came into some money.
translation.zh: 嗯 你应该去 我听说她最近弄了点钱

translation.en: I guess she made out a whole hell of a lot better than any of us did.
translation.zh:
看样子
她比我们所有人的结局都好得多

translation.en: That seems about right.
When you see Molly and the girls...
translation.zh: 等你看到茉莉和他女儿们…

translation.en: remind them who he was.
translation.zh: 告诉她们他是什么样的人

translation.en: Yeah, I will.
Take care of yourself, all right?
You, too.
[William] Maybe we can go do something good with it one day.
translation.zh: 也许有一天我们可以用来做点好事
